00027 // This template class will be used to create some other classes for future commands
00028 // KviIrcConnectionAsyncWhoData for creating an awho command
00029 // KviIrcConnectionAsyncWhowasData for creating an awhowas command
00030 // It is now also used by KviIrcConnectionAsyncWhoisData
00031 
00032 template <class T>
00033 class KVIRC_API KviIrcConnectionAsyncTemplateData
00034 {
00035 public:
00036         KviIrcConnectionAsyncTemplateData()
00037         {
00038                 m_pInfoList = 0;
00039         }
00040 
00041         ~KviIrcConnectionAsyncTemplateData()
00042         {
00043                 if(m_pInfoList)delete m_pInfoList;
00044         }
00045 
00046 protected:
00047         KviPointerList<T> * m_pInfoList; // awhois pending stuff
00048 public:
00049         void add(T * i)
00050         {
00051                 if(!m_pInfoList)
00052                 {
00053                         m_pInfoList = new KviPointerList<T>;
00054                         m_pInfoList->setAutoDelete(true);
00055                 }
00056                 m_pInfoList->append(i);
00057         }
00058 
00059         T * lookup(const QString &nick)
00060         {
00061                 if(!m_pInfoList)return 0;
00062                 for(T * i = m_pInfoList->first();i;i = m_pInfoList->next())
00063                 {
00064                         if(KviQString::equalCI(nick,i->szNick))return i;
00065                 }
00066                 return 0;
00067         }
00068 
00069         void remove(T * i)
00070         {
00071                 if(!m_pInfoList)return;
00072                 m_pInfoList->removeRef(i);
00073                 if(m_pInfoList->isEmpty())
00074                 {
00075                         delete m_pInfoList;
00076                         m_pInfoList = 0;
00077                 }
00078         }
00079 };
00080 
00081 #endif
00082
